data.comment: Ural Yekaterinburg kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 2, Ilya Samoshnikov of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 4, In Kazan, Soltmurad Bakaev of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rubin Kazan drive upfield and Oliver Abildgaard gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 8, Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
In the minute 11, An attacking Ural Yekaterinburg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Ural Yekaterinburg take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Eric Bicfalvi spot-kick..
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 16, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for Rubin Kazan is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan's Mikhail Merkulov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
In the minute 19, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Mikhail Merkulov (Rubin Kazan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 22, Ural Yekaterinburg's Rafal Augustyniak gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 24, Ivan Ignatyev (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
At Kazan Arena, Ural Yekaterinburg are penalized for being offside.
Rubin Kazan's Soltmurad Bakaev breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 25, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
In the minute 30, Igor Konovalov for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
At Kazan Arena, Mikhail Merkulov has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 33, An attacking Rubin Kazan player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Ural Yekaterinburg's Roman Emeljanov has been booked in Kazan.
Ivan Ignatyev levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg surge into the attack at Kazan Arena but Aleksey Gerasimov’s header is off-target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Attention is being given to Ural Yekaterinburg’s Vladimir Rykov and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 43, Vladimir Rykov for Ural Yekaterinburg is back on the field again.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Marco Aratore (Ural Yekaterinburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
In the minute 45, Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Kazan.
At Kazan Arena, Marco Aratore has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to start the second-half. Rubin Kazan with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 48, Ural Yekaterinburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rubin Kazan.
Denys Kulakov (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 49, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Vladimir Rykov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 52, Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Kazan Arena.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 54, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Othman El Kabir is replacing Marco Aratore for Ural Yekaterinburg at Kazan Arena.
Ural Yekaterinburg advance rapidly upfield but Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows for offside.
Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Eric Bicfalvi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Roman Emeljanov has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
In the minute 64, Oleg Aleksandrovich Veretennikov is making the team's first substitution at Kazan Arena with Denis Makarov replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
Dmitri Tarasov is replacing Darko Jevtic for the home team.
The home team replace Ivan Ignatyev with Djordje Despotovic.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ural Yekaterinburg’s Igor Kalinin is on his feet again at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 67, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi waits before resuming play because Igor Kalinin for Ural Yekaterinburg is still down.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia of Rubin Kazan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Djordje Despotovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 71, Rubin Kazan attack but Djordje Despotovic's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Othman El Kabir for the away team is judged to be offside.
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a second substitution, with Danijel Miskic replacing Andrey Panyukov.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Andrey Egorychev with Dmitri Efremov. This is the third substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
Eric Bicfalvi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 74, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 75, Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov is on target but unsuccessful.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 78, Ural Yekaterinburg push upfield and Aleksey Gerasimov gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Rubin Kazan defence.
Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Kazan Arena.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
The home team have replaced Igor Konovalov with Pavel Mogilevets. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oleg Aleksandrovich Veretennikov.
In the minute 83, Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Ural Yekaterinburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In Kazan Rubin Kazan drive forward through Djordje Despotovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, Yaroslav Godzyur (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 89, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Kazan Arena and Eric Bicfalvi gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Rubin Kazan defence.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
That's full-time at Kazan Arena. The final score is 1-1.
Danijel Miskic for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi and receives a first yellow card.
